conversations.content: I want to continue with my Spanish conversation practice workspace

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731009000000_c5v7b9n1m", "workspaceId": "ws_1731009000000_s1p2b3n4c", "sessionDescription": "Spanish B1 level focused on conversation fluency for upcoming Barcelona trip", "sessionMemory": "Day 45 of 90-day intensive.
